Description_lang: Empowered by the Azerite Flare your damage done or healing is increased by $s1% and max health is increased by $s3%. Holding the flare reduces the health of the carrier by $m5% to $M5% per $t5 sec. Being defeated in combat drops the Azerite Flare.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage or healing done increased by $s1%. Max health is increased by $s3%. Holding the flare reduces health by $m5% to $M5% per $t5 sec. Being defeated in combat drops the Azerite Flare.
